item.title: I need help with INF HP!
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

Try this;

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("idfctbh")) { if (playerLevel[3] <= 50) { currentHealth = playerLevel[3]; playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]); refreshSkills(); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } }
Untested, just wrote that off memory.

item.title: I need help with INF HP!
item.dc:creator: @slomifier slomifier
item.description:
@slomifier wrote:

OMG, I’ve been waiting to show someone this lol.

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Inf Hp Test")){ // infinity health hitdiff = -999999999; }

Makes it so people hit Blues on you, and it doesnt subtract from your HP. I made a ring of recoil activate this, as a invincibility ring.

Read full topic

item.title: I need help with INF HP!
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

alright… i have this if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Inf Hp Test")){ // infinity health if(IsDead) IsDead = false; NewHP = playerLevel[3]; }

I have the name as Inf Hp Test because that was the account I was testing it on…that is under the public boolean process and its still not working. help me…what do i do?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 30, 2008, 03:28:34 pm[/size][hr]anyone? cmon i need help[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 30, 2008, 03:44:57 pm[/size][hr]omg cmon!!
